summary:
This mod adds a new armor set called \"A Blood Benders Armor\". 
This armor is intended to extend my spell mod called \"[url=http://http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=118250193]A Blood Benders Mind[/url]\".
Both mods are lore-friendly and balanced.
descriptionHtml:
[h1]NEWS FLASH: I\'ll be on a skieing trip from February 15th till February 24th![/h1]

[b]Requirements:[/b]
- Latest updates

This mod adds a new armor set called \"A Blood Benders Armor\". 
This armor is intended to extend my spell mod called \"[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29464]A Blood Benders Mind[/url]\".
Both mods are lore-friendly and balanced.

The armor is found at: Bleak Falls Tower
(console: coc bleakfallstower)

[b]Features:[/b]
* Enchanted effect when wearing the full set.
* Custom Textures

This is a work in progress and both mods will eventually get a fully voiced quest.

~---~---~---~---~---~

[b]Skype:[/b] Dyramisty
[b]Facebook:[/b] [url=http://www.facebook.com/ddeheer]Dylan de Heer[/url]

[b]Skyrim Nexus:[/b] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1384870]Dyramisty[/url]

~---~---~---~---~---~

[b]CHANGELOG:[/b] 
V1.0:
* Release
author: Dyramisty
